sections.text: A contract may be awarded through noncompetitive negotiations when there is only one source for the required good or service.
The CPO shall make a determination and findings justifying the sole source procurement.
Notice of intent to enter into a sole source contract shall be posted on the Internet at least 10 days prior to award. The notice shall include:
The determination and findings required by subsection (b) of this section;
A description of the item to be procured; and
The contract shall be made available online within 7 days of the contract award.
